name: Orbital Station - Reclaimed
desc:
A reclaimed droneship Nexus, equipped with salvaged weapon batteries and arc spires

Must be reduced before invasions or bombardment can be attempted.

name: Battlestation - Reclaimed
desc:
A reclaimed droneship Nexus, Augmented with shield modules and additional weapon batteries and defensive plating

Must be reduced before invasions or bombardment can be attempted.

name: Star Fortress - Reclaimed
desc:
A reclaimed droneship nexus, Up armored with deautomated energy modules, an Earthbreaker battery, and higher quality gun batteries
Must be reduced before invasions or bombardment can be attempted.
